function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective surveillance systems for infectious disease outbreaks","Impact":"Delay in intervention and control of outbreaks, leading to increased spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implement robust surveillance systems at all scales, including population-wide surveillance","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE), advanced biomarker extraction, analytical tools for multi-residue analysis","People":"General population, healthcare workers, global community","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments, researchers"},{"Description":"Challenges in implementing WBE for infectious disease surveillance","Impact":"Inability to track and manage the spread of the virus effectively","Mitigation":"Rapid advancements in biomarker extraction techniques, estimation of population size, and biomarker discovery pipeline","Technologies":"Advanced biomarker extraction techniques, population estimation tools, biomarker discovery pipeline","People":"Research institutions, public health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Researchers, technology developers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of analytical tools for cost-effective, sensitive, and selective analysis of biomarker groups","Impact":"Inability to accurately analyze and monitor biomarkers in wastewater for disease surveillance","Mitigation":"Development of analytical tools for multi-residue analysis of a wide range of biomarker groups","Technologies":"Advanced analytical tools for multi-residue analysis","People":"Research institutions, technology developers, public health authorities","Owner":"Technology developers, researchers, public health authorities"}]}
